evidence: the delta function plays a central role in signal processing
how a continuous function can be represented using delta functions
integral from minus infinity to infinity
each point - each “particle” - contributes through a delta function
particle-like view of a continuous function
The integral from minus infinity to infinity of delta of t minus t naught, times f of t, d t - equals f of t naught
triples.o: value of f at t naught

triples.evidence: The product of the delta function and a continuous function f can be measured to give a unique result.

concepts.term: It's a kind of weighted sum of deltas - where the weights are just the values of the function itself

evidence: The integral from minus infinity to infinity of delta of t minus t naught, times f of t, d t - equals f of t naught.
